title: Sri Lanka's Participation at the World Expo Exposition 2015, Milan, Italy
decision_details: -  the next World Expo Exposition is scheduled to be held in Milan, Italy from 01st May to 31st October, 2015. The primary objective of this Exposition is to highlight the economic, cultural and scientific achievements of a country and to share the knowledge and technology in all spheres gained by the country with the rest of the world.  The proposal made by Hon. Rishad Bathiudeen, Minister of Industry and Commerce, to proceed with the preliminary work relating to Sri Lanka's participation at this Exposition, was approved by the Cabinet.
